name: rakish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
old-fashioned A rakish man, especially a rich man, lives in an immoral way, especially having sex with a lot of women: He has a rakish air about him.
old-fashioned confidently careless and informal: He wore his hat at a rakish angle.
